channel.title: Portfolios on NeuRise
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on NeuRise

item.title: № 2 - Inter-areal communication
item.description: Our second serie will revolve around Interareal communication and will happen in March and April. Want to give a talk? Stay tuned for the announcement of the opening of the application process!

item.title: № 1 - Neuroscience at the intersection of experiments and theory
item.description: NeuRise is excited to announce its first speakers! We will be kicking off the seminar with our first serie, “Neuroscience at the intersection of experiment and theory” The dates are the following - talks titles and Zoom links to follow very soon! 13th of January 2021, 5pm CET Nicolas Meirhaeghe: “Neural population dynamics in the macaque frontal cortex reveals hallmarks of sensory predictive processing” - Jazayeri lab, MIT 27th of January 2021, 5pm CET
